biocontainers.name: isodyn
biocontainers.summary: C++ simulating the dynamics of metabolites and their isotopic isomers in metabolic network kinetic

biotools.summary: “C++”-program simulating the dynamics of metabolites and their isotopic isomers in the central metabolic network using a corresponding kinetic model. Supports the final step of 13C assisted the fluxomic analysis: evaluation of metabolic fluxes consistent with a given mass isotopomer distribution. The previous steps are supported by Ramid, Midcor, Isoform.
